entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
